  • Classes in goal.core.program.literals used by goal.core.kr 
    Class and Description
    MentalStateCond
    Mental state conditions occur as conditions in the rules of a GOAL program but are also used for other purposes.
  • Classes in goal.core.program.literals used by goal.core.mentalstate 
    Class and Description
    MentalLiteral
    A mental literal is an object of the form .bel(...) or .goal(...), (or goal-a or a-goal).
